description:
Confessing to being the spy within Fukurou, Akira leaves after pledging to Tsugumi that he will protect her. Rattled by the revelation of his betrayal, the other members are unable to hide their upset. After leaving Fukurou, Akira heads straight for Shiginuma to angrily confront him for his threats to Tsugumi. Meanwhile, Tsugumi learns some surprising new information about cursed tomes from Nabari.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Colors of the Flames of Love: Tragedy
